body.name: ASUS ZenBeam L2 Smart Portable LED Projector - 960 LED Lumens, 1080P, Chromecast, 10W Bluetooth Speaker, Built-in battery, 3.5 hour Video Playback, Wireless Projection, ASUS Light Wall, Android TV Box

features: 960 LED lumens output and Full HD native resolution, plus 4K compatibility
Short-throw lens projects a 40-inch image from one meter, and up to a 120-inch image at three meters
Includes Google Certified Android 12 TV box with preloaded Netflix
Connectivity includes Chromecast, HDMI, one USB-C with DP Alt mode and one USB-C for charging, USB Type-A (5 V/1.5 A) and earphone jack
ASUS Light Wall includes 26 different cinemagraphs for variable ambiances
body.description: The ZenBeam L2 gives it an elegant design that’ll never be out of place. With such versatility at your command, you’ll be able to bring it with you everywhere. Its sturdy leather carrying handle offers an understated touch of luxury. Subdued blue and charcoal finishes lend the device an air of professionalism that’ll fit right in with the tech you use for work and the modern décor of your home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Take Charge in Your Choice of Entertainment You’ll also find a bundled TV box that puts you in charge of the show with Android TV. After a brief and easy setup, you’ll be able to quickly pull up your favorite content from Netflix, Disney+, Amazon Prime Video, and more using the included remote control. For convenience on the go, the TV box fits neatly right inside the ZenBeam L2. *An app’s availability may vary by different regions. Your Own Personal Assistant Make life easier and smarter Control the ZenBeam L2 with a simple voice command* for maximum convenience. *By pressing "Google assistant" button on the remote control. Wireless Content Sharing Easily share from your device Built-in support for Chromecast lets you use your smartphone or tablet to wirelessly control the content on display.

Bring Up the Fun Vibes with the ASUS Light Wall Options The ZenBeam L2 has an integrated light wall functionality that can spruce up the look of any room. You have up to 26 different built-in content options that let you turn any wall into a virtual window with colorful effects. This allows you to make any room feel cozier with natural-looking light and fun designs. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and best picture quality
reviews.reviewText: This Zenbeam L2 portable projector is incredibly lightweight, extremely easy to set up, and it comes with built-in Android TV, allowing you to play videos directly. The key feature is that a single charge allows you to watch a movie for up to 3.5 hours, making it perfect for outdoor activities. Most importantly, it has an automatic focus function that adjusts the best picture quality and angle, saving a lot of setup time. I really love this projector and highly recommend it to friends who need it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars GREAT PRODUCT WITH SOME SECURITY CONCERNS
reviews.reviewText: I love this projector with some concerns. For the money, this is better in my bedroom than a huge tv could ever be. Keystone and autofocus work well. Setup was easy. Speakers are decent but a Bluetooth speaker can significantly improve the sound. Fan noise is moderate. The included Hako Mini Android TV dongle sucks. First, Plex and Jellyfin had no sound with movies. This may be the L2’s issue but my Firestick worked perfectly. My main concern was that the Hako set off my OPNsense firewall. It was constantly trying to send data to unknown IP addresses. My Apple devices started prompting me for password resets. I’m sticking with my Firestick 4K Max although I wish I could fit it inside the unit like Asus did for the Hako Mini. Once I reset and disabled the Hako, the Apple password reset requests stopped. Coincidence? Who knows?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Travel and Home Theater with TV Box
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this Zenbeam L2 portable projector for its great picture quality with FHD resolution and 960 LED lumens brightness. It also has the convenient instant autofocus feature to always present the best viewing angle and built in battery for 3.5hr playtime. Perfect for online workout/yoga classes setting as well. I also like the light wall features to get the party vibes.The best of this projector is Android TV Box with easy setup. I can choose multiple apps such as Netflix, Disney+ and Amazon Prime Video…etc. with included remote control.Highly recommended for this luxury designed projector!
